resources.string: You will be lucky next round

Create: A new game session will be created. 
You will be the host and playmaker. 
Others will be able to join your session. 

Join: Join an already created session by its unique ID. You will be a normal player.
"Contacts permissions are needed for providing email completions."

Please enter your name. 
It will be used for identification during the game. 

Please enter the ID of the play you want to join in. The session ID will be displayed at the host's app after a session was created.
Here you can see your score in this round.
Please enter your name. \nIt will be used for identification during the game. \nThe session ID is for other players to join your game.
Please wait while other players join your session.\nThe game will start as soon as your host agrees to.

Please wait while other players join your session.\nWhen all players joined your game, you can start it by clicking continue.\nDon\'t forget: Others will be able to join even during an already started game via the session ID.
Please answer following question truthfully.\nYou will get to the next step after everyone has answered or your host has decided to continue manually.

Please answer following question truthfully.\nYou will get to the next step after everyone has answered or you decide to continue manually.\nWarning: When you click continue while others haven\'t answered yet, they won\'t be able to participate in this round. They can join again with the following question.
Now guess correctly how many of these players answered the last Question with YES - yourself included.
Now guess correctly how many of these players answered the last Question with YES - yourself included.

Please wait while other players answer the question.\nWhen all players answered, the next step will automatically appear. But you can manually start it by clicking continue.\nWarning: When you click continue while others haven\'t answered yet, they won\'t be able to participate in this round. They can join again with the following question.
